Login.OlvidemicontrasenaTexto: Enter your email address and send a link to configure a new password

Home.Title: Book unforgettable experiences around the world
Home.Dondeviajar: Where do you want to travel?
Home.Buscacercania: Search for experiences in your vicinity
Home.CancelaciongratuitaTexto: Get a full refund if you cancel within 24 hours of purchase. In case of a special activity you should contact the operator for reimbursement.

Profile.SincronizaSesion: Synchronize your reservation and manage your tour and access your favorite activities faster.

EditProfile.name: Nombre
EditProfile.DesactivarcuentaTexto: If your account is deactivated, it will no longer be available. You will not be able to log in and access your profile. All opinions, photos and tips that have been easily published on the website
EditProfile.AñadedocumentoText: This process helps us to verify that you are your
EditProfile.IdentificacionTitle: We will add an official identification
EditProfile.IdentificacionText: We will not share this information with any personnel or entity

Emergencia.TextoContactoEmergencia: Having an emergency contact gives us another option to help you if you are ever in an emergency situation.

ComoFunciona.Title1Texto: Descubre el mundo a través de la mirada de LOKKL, el ingrediente mágico de tu viaje es nuestra obsesión por personalizar tu experiencia, de acuerdo a lo que desees conocer y sugerirte lo que solo un LOKKL conoce.
ComoFunciona.Title2Texto: Selecciona la opción que más te agrade entre nuestros guías certificados y exclusivos tours y ¡listo! tendrás el tour a tu medida, reservado y garantizado.
ComoFunciona.Title3Texto: Hay muchas y diferentes maneras de viajar, pero tú, has elegido la mejor, solo te queda disfrutar de esta inigualable experiencia. Nuestro equipo de especialistas está para servirte 24/7.
ComoFunciona.Title4Texto: Ayudanos a mejorar nuestro servicio comparte y califica tu experiencia.

Help.EnviamosmailText: Write to our customer service department
Help.EnvianosWhatsAppText: Write to us directly and quickly, one of our representatives will attend you shortly
Help.TienesunapreguntaTexto: If you have any questions you can consult our help section and we will support you at every step

CancelReservation.NopuedesCancelarText: I'm sorry you can no longer cancel your reservation as it is within the 48 hours allowed for cancellation.
CancelReservation.NopuedesCancelarText2: Communicate with support to be able to know the details and inform if you consider it an error.

Alertas.NoInternet2: Contact us if the problem continues

TourDetalleExtra.Cancelacion48: Accounts with 48 hours for cancellation without cost
